description.value: -10 to Fellowship with relevent Group, such as: Academics, Sororitas, Arbites, Mechanicus, Administratum, Ecclesiarchy, Government, Imperial Guard, Imperial Navy, Inquistion, Military, Navigators, Nobility, Rogue Trader, Underworld, Workers. Ork Groups Include: Bad Moons, Blood Axes, Death Skulls, Evil Suns, Snakebites, Mekboyz, Painboyz, Runtherdz, Freebooters.

characteristics.condition: When dealing with chosen enemy group

specialAbilities.name: Enemy (X)
specialAbilities.description: You have made an enemy of a group or organization. Take -10 to Fellowship tests with that group. They will act with hostility.
